title: Iron-based metal–organic framework/graphene oxide composite electrodes for efficient flow-injection amperometric detection of dexamethasone
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23921-23929
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03815K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chanida Jakkrawhad, Fonthip Makkliang, Piyaluk Nurerk, Mohamed Siaj, Sujittra Poorahong
A highly stable flow-injection amperometric sensor for dexamethasone (DEX) was developed using a pencil graphite electrode (PGE) modified with Fe-based metal organic frameworks, MIL-100(Fe) and graphene oxide composite materials (MIL-100(Fe)/GO).
